DOC.brief_summary: Multi-center prospective randomize trial single port laparoscopic surgery ( SILS ) versus conventional 3-4 port laparoscopic hysterectomy . Hypothesis conversion rate SILS inferior conventional approach .
DOC.brief_title: Single Incision Laparoscopic Surgery ( SILS ) Versus Conventional Laparoscopic Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic ( dysmenorrhea , palpable mass , pelvic pain discomfort urinary symptom , increase size , menorrhagia ) myoma adenomyomas Uterine size < gestational age 14 week Informed consent Medical diseases heart failure , renal insufficiency , liver cirrhosis , pancreatitis , uncontrolled DM Huge uterine size > gestational age 14 week
